titleStmt.title: In the Old-baily, next door to the sign of the Black-Bull, is a sweating-house for eighteen pence a time; where both men and women may be very well accomodated at convenient seasons. Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays for men; Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Saturdays for women.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
